verses.verse: בֶּן־ <WH1121> old עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <WH6242> [was] twenty שָׁנָה֙ <WH8141> years אָחָ֣ז <WH271> Ahaz בְּמָלְכ֔וֹ <WH4427> when he began to reign וְשֵׁשׁ־ <WH8337> six עֶשְׂרֵ֣ה <WH6240> teen שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> years מָלַ֖ךְ <WH4427> and he reigned בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> in Jerusalem וְלֹא־ <WH3808> did not עָשָׂ֧ה <WH6213> but he did הַיָּשָׁ֛ר <WH3477> not [that which was] right בְּעֵינֵ֥י <WH5869> in the sight יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD כְּדָוִ֥יד <WH1732> like David אָבִֽיו׃ <WH1> his father

וַיֵּ֕לֶךְ <WH1980> walked בְּדַרְכֵ֖י <WH1870> the ways מַלְכֵ֣י <WH4428> of the kings יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וְגַ֧ם <WH1571> also מַסֵּכ֛וֹת <WH4541> also molten images עָשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> and made לַבְּעָלִֽים׃ <WH1168> for Baalim

וְה֥וּא <WH1931> he הִקְטִ֖יר <WH6999> Moreover he burnt incense בְּגֵ֣יא <WH1516> in the valley בֶן־ <WH1121> of the son הִנֹּ֑ם <WH2011> of Hinnom וַיַּבְעֵ֤ר <WH1197> and burnt אֶת־ <WH853> בָּנָיו֙ <WH1121> his children בָּאֵ֔שׁ <WH784> in the fire כְּתֹֽעֲבוֹת֙ <WH8441> after the abominations הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> of the heathen אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> whom הֹרִ֣ישׁ <WH3068> whom the LORD יְהוָ֔ה <WH3423> had cast out מִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> before בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וַיְזַבֵּ֧חַ <WH2076> He sacrificed וַיְקַטֵּ֛ר <WH6999> also and burnt incense בַּבָּמ֖וֹת <WH1116> in the high places וְעַל־ <WH5921> on הַגְּבָע֑וֹת <WH1389> and on the hills וְתַ֖חַת <WH8478> and under כָּל־ <WH3605> every עֵ֥ץ <WH6086> tree רַעֲנָֽן׃ <WH7488> and under every green

וַֽיִּתְּנֵ֜הוּ <WH5414> delivered יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Wherefore the LORD אֱלֹהָיו֮ <WH430> his God בְּיַ֣ד <WH3027> him into the hand מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> of the king אֲרָם֒ <WH758> of Syria וַיַּ֨כּוּ־ <WH5221> and they smote ב֔וֹ וַיִּשְׁבּ֤וּ <WH7617> him and carried away מִמֶּ֙נּוּ֙ <WH4480> number שִׁבְיָ֣ה <WH7633> of them captives גְדוֹלָ֔ה <WH1419> a great multitude וַיָּבִ֖יאוּ <WH935> and brought דַּרְמָ֑שֶׂק <WH1834> [them] to Damascus וְ֠גַם <WH1571> was also בְּיַד־ <WH3027> into the hand מֶ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> of the king יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel נִתָּ֔ן <WH5414> And he was also delivered וַיַּךְ־ <WH5221> who smote בּ֖וֹ מַכָּ֥ה <WH4347> slaughter גְדוֹלָֽה׃ <WH1419> him with a great ס

וַיַּהֲרֹג֩ <WH2026> slew פֶּ֨קַח <WH6492> For Pekah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son רְמַלְיָ֜הוּ <WH7425> of Remaliah בִּֽיהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> in Judah מֵאָ֨ה <WH3967> an hundred וְעֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> and twenty אֶ֛לֶף <WH505> thousand בְּי֥וֹם <WH3117> day אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> in one הַכֹּ֣ל <WH3605> all בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> men חָ֑יִל <WH2428> [which were] all valiant בְּעָזְבָ֕ם <WH5800> because they had forsaken אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> God אֲבוֹתָֽם׃ <WH1> of their fathers

וַֽיַּהֲרֹ֞ג <WH2026> slew זִכְרִ֣י ׀ <WH2147> And Zichri גִּבּ֣וֹר <WH1368> a mighty man אֶפְרַ֗יִם <WH669> of Ephraim אֶת־ <WH853> מַעֲשֵׂיָ֙הוּ֙ <WH4641> Maaseiah בֶּן־ <WH1121> son הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> the king's וְאֶת־ <WH853> עַזְרִיקָ֖ם <WH5840> and Azrikam נְגִ֣יד <WH5057> the governor הַבָּ֑יִת <WH1004> of the house וְאֶת־ <WH853> אֶלְקָנָ֖ה <WH511> and Elkanah מִשְׁנֵ֥ה <WH4932> [that was] next הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> to the king ס

וַיִּשְׁבּוּ֩ <WH7617> carried away captive בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֨ל <WH3478> of Israel מֵֽאֲחֵיהֶ֜ם <WH251> of their brethren מָאתַ֣יִם <WH3967> two hundred אֶ֗לֶף <WH505> thousand נָשִׁים֙ <WH802> women בָּנִ֣ים <WH1121> sons וּבָנ֔וֹת <WH1323> and daughters וְגַם־ <WH1571> also שָׁלָ֥ל <WH7998> spoil רָ֖ב <WH7227> much בָּזְז֣וּ <WH962> and took also away מֵהֶ֑ם <WH1992> them וַיָּבִ֥יאוּ <WH935> from them and brought אֶת־ <WH853> הַשָּׁלָ֖ל <WH7998> the spoil לְשֹׁמְרֽוֹן׃ <WH8111> to Samaria ס

וְ֠שָׁם <WH8033> was there הָיָ֨ה <WH1961> become נָבִ֥יא <WH5030> But a prophet לַֽיהוָה֮ <WH3068> of the LORD עֹדֵ֣ד <WH5752> [was] Oded שְׁמוֹ֒ <WH8034> was there whose name וַיֵּצֵ֗א <WH3318> and he went out לִפְנֵ֤י <WH6440> before הַצָּבָא֙ <WH6635> the host הַבָּ֣א <WH935> that came לְשֹׁמְר֔וֹן <WH8111> to Samaria וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and said לָהֶ֗ם הִ֠נֵּה <WH2009> Behold בַּחֲמַ֨ת <WH2534> was wroth יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> unto them Behold because the LORD אֱלֹהֵֽי־ <WH430> God אֲבוֹתֵיכֶ֛ם <WH1> of your fathers עַל־ <WH5921> with יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> with Judah נְתָנָ֣ם <WH5414> he hath delivered בְּיֶדְכֶ֑ם <WH3027> them into your hand וַתַּֽהַרְגוּ־ <WH2026> and ye have slain בָ֣ם בְזַ֔עַף <WH2197> them in a rage עַ֥ד <WH5704> has even לַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <WH8064> unto heaven הִגִּֽיעַ׃ <WH5060> [that] reacheth up

וְ֠עַתָּה <WH6258> Now בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> the children יְהוּדָ֤ה <WH3063> of Judah וִֽירוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <WH3389> and Jerusalem אַתֶּ֣ם <WH859> you אֹמְרִ֔ים <WH559> And now ye purpose לִכְבֹּ֛שׁ <WH3533> to keep under לַעֲבָדִ֥ים <WH5650> for bondmen וְלִשְׁפָח֖וֹת <WH8198> and bondwomen לָכֶ֑ם הֲלֹ֤א <WH3808> not רַק־ <WH7535> unto you [but are there] not with you even אַתֶּם֙ <WH859> you עִמָּכֶ֣ם <WH5973> of your own אֲשָׁמ֔וֹת <WH819> with you sins לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> against the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH430> angels

וְעַתָּ֣ה <WH6258> Now שְׁמָע֔וּנִי <WH8085> Now hear וְהָשִׁ֙יבוּ֙ <WH7725> me therefore and deliver הַשִּׁבְיָ֔ה <WH7633> the captives אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whom שְׁבִיתֶ֖ם <WH7617> again which ye have taken captive מֵאֲחֵיכֶ֑ם <WH251> of your brethren כִּ֛י <WH3588> for חֲר֥וֹן <WH2740> for the fierce אַף־ <WH639> wrath יְהוָ֖ה <WH3069> God עֲלֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH5921> is against ס

וַיָּקֻ֨מוּ <WH6965> stood up אֲנָשִׁ֜ים <WH376> some מֵרָאשֵׁ֣י <WH7218> of the heads בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children אֶפְרַ֗יִם <WH669> of Ephraim עֲזַרְיָ֤הוּ <WH5838> Azariah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son יְהֽוֹחָנָן֙ <WH3076> of Johanan בֶּרֶכְיָ֣הוּ <WH1296> Berechiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son מְשִׁלֵּמ֔וֹת <WH4919> of Meshillemoth וִֽיחִזְקִיָּ֙הוּ֙ <WH3169> and Jehizkiah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son שַׁלֻּ֔ם <WH7967> of Shallum וַעֲמָשָׂ֖א <WH6021> and Amasa בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son חַדְלָ֑י <WH2311> of Hadlai עַל־ <WH5921> against הַבָּאִ֖ים <WH935> against them that came מִן־ <WH4480> from הַצָּבָֽא׃ <WH6635> from the war

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <WH559> And said לָהֶ֗ם לֹא־ <WH3808> must not תָבִ֤יאוּ <WH935> unto them Ye shall not bring in אֶת־ <WH853> הַשִּׁבְיָה֙ <WH7633> the captives הֵ֔נָּה <WH2008> here כִּי֩ <WH3588> for לְאַשְׁמַ֨ת <WH819> hither for whereas we have offended יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> against the LORD עָלֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH5921> is against אַתֶּ֣ם <WH859> you אֹמְרִ֔ים <WH559> [already] ye intend לְהֹסִ֥יף <WH3254> to add עַל־ <WH5921> is against חַטֹּאתֵ֖ינוּ <WH2403> [more] to our sins וְעַל־ <WH5921> is against אַשְׁמָתֵ֑ינוּ <WH819> and to our trespass כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for רַבָּ֤ה <WH7227> is great אַשְׁמָה֙ <WH819> for our trespass לָ֔נוּ וַחֲר֥וֹן <WH2740> and [there is] fierce אָ֖ף <WH639> wrath עַל־ <WH5921> is against יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> against Israel ס

וַיַּעֲזֹ֣ב <WH5800> left הֶֽחָל֗וּץ <WH2502> So the armed men אֶת־ <WH853> הַשִּׁבְיָה֙ <WH7633> the captives וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַבִּזָּ֔ה <WH961> and the spoil לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before הַשָּׂרִ֖ים <WH8269> the princes וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הַקָּהָֽל׃ <WH6951> and all the congregation

וַיָּקֻ֣מוּ <WH6965> rose up הָאֲנָשִׁים֩ <WH376> the men אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who נִקְּב֨וּ <WH5344> which were expressed בְשֵׁמ֜וֹת <WH8034> by name וַיַּחֲזִ֣יקוּ <WH2388> and took בַשִּׁבְיָ֗ה <WH7633> the captives וְכָֽל־ <WH3605> all מַעֲרֻמֵּיהֶם֮ <WH4636> all that were naked הִלְבִּ֣ישׁוּ <WH3847> clothed מִן־ <WH4480> from הַשָּׁלָל֒ <WH7998> and with the spoil וַיַּלְבִּשׁ֣וּם <WH3847> among them and arrayed וַ֠יַּנְעִלוּם <WH5274> them and shod וַיַּאֲכִל֨וּם <WH398> them and gave them to eat וַיַּשְׁק֜וּם <WH8248> and to drink וַיְסֻכ֗וּם <WH5480> and anointed וַיְנַהֲל֤וּם <WH5095> them and carried בַּחֲמֹרִים֙ <WH2543> of them upon asses לְכָל־ <WH3605> all כּוֹשֵׁ֔ל <WH3782> all the feeble וַיְבִיא֛וּם <WH935> and brought יְרֵח֥וֹ <WH3405> them to Jericho עִיר־ <WH5892> the city הַתְּמָרִ֖ים <WH8558> of palm אֵ֣צֶל <WH681> to אֲחֵיהֶ֑ם <WH251> their brethren וַיָּשׁ֖וּבוּ <WH7725> then they returned שֹׁמְרֽוֹן׃ <WH8111> to Samaria פ

בָּעֵ֣ת <WH6256> At that time הַהִ֗יא <WH1931> he שָׁלַ֞ח <WH7971> send הַמֶּ֧לֶךְ <WH4428> did king אָחָ֛ז <WH271> Ahaz עַל־ <WH5921> unto מַלְכֵ֥י <WH4428> unto the kings אַשּׁ֖וּר <WH804> of Assyria לַעְזֹ֥ר <WH5826> to help לֽוֹ׃

וְע֥וֹד <WH5750> again אֲדוֹמִ֖ים <WH130> For again the Edomites בָּ֑אוּ <WH935> had come וַיַּכּ֥וּ <WH5221> and smitten בִיהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> Judah וַיִּשְׁבּוּ־ <WH7617> and carried away שֶֽׁבִי׃ <WH7628> captives

וּפְלִשְׁתִּ֣ים <WH6430> The Philistines פָּשְׁט֗וּ <WH6584> also had invaded בְּעָרֵ֨י <WH5892> the cities הַשְּׁפֵלָ֣ה <WH8219> of the low country וְהַנֶּגֶב֮ <WH5045> and of the south לִֽיהוּדָה֒ <WH3063> of Judah וַֽ֠יִּלְכְּדוּ <WH3920> and had taken אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּֽית־ שֶׁ֨מֶשׁ <WH1053> Bethshemesh וְאֶת־ <WH853> אַיָּל֜וֹן <WH357> and Ajalon וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַגְּדֵר֗וֹת <WH1450> and Gederoth וְאֶת־ <WH853> שׂוֹכ֤וֹ <WH7755> and Shocho וּבְנוֹתֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH1323> with the villages וְאֶת־ <WH853> תִּמְנָ֣ה <WH8553> thereof and Timnah וּבְנוֹתֶ֔יהָ <WH1323> with the villages וְאֶת־ <WH853> גִּמְז֖וֹ <WH1579> thereof Gimzo וְאֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֹתֶ֑יהָ <WH1323> also and the villages וַיֵּשְׁב֖וּ <WH3427> thereof and they dwelt שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> there

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הִכְנִ֤יעַ <WH3665> low יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> For the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> Judah בַּעֲב֖וּר <WH5668> because אָחָ֣ז <WH271> because of Ahaz מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel כִּ֤י <WH3588> for הִפְרִ֙יעַ֙ <WH6544> naked בִּֽיהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> Judah וּמָע֥וֹל <WH4603> and transgressed מַ֖עַל <WH4604> sore בַּיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> against the LORD

וַיָּבֹ֣א <WH935> came עָלָ֔יו <WH5921> against תִּלְּגַ֥ת פִּלְנְאֶ֖סֶר <WH8407> And Tilgathpilneser מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king אַשּׁ֑וּר <WH804> of Assyria וַיָּ֥צַר <WH6696> unto him and distressed ל֖וֹ וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> instead חֲזָקֽוֹ׃ <WH2388> him but strengthened

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Although חָלַ֤ק <WH2505> took away a portion אָחָז֙ <WH271> For Ahaz אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> [out] of the house יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְאֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> and [out] of the house הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> of the king וְהַשָּׂרִ֑ים <WH8269> and of the princes וַיִּתֵּן֙ <WH5414> and gave לְמֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> [it] unto the king אַשּׁ֔וּר <WH804> of Assyria וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> did not לְעֶזְרָ֖ה <WH5833> but he helped לֽוֹ׃
